title: Baobei Yi Jia
synopsis: The story takes place in an ordinary family in a modern city. One night, the arrival of Mou Mou, a little alien from Candy Planet, made his family fall out of the sky. At first, the family was like a big enemy, but then he discovered that Mou Mou was not scary at all, but rather behaved. He saved Xiao Xiao Baby Yoyo. Everyone finally decided to take him in, and Mou Mou officially became a member of the family and was elected as the family's mascot. In terms of style, the play has a strong comedy color. The humorous language can be seen everywhere in the play, and the playful plots are everywhere, which makes people laugh and laugh. In the laughter, forget the troubles and fill the heart with sunshine. . The addition of the little aliens brings magic to the story, making the drama bloom on the bars, full of fairy tales, which will greatly satisfy the curiosity of the small audiences and light up their innocence. fantasy. (translated from iqiyi)
